testsuite.name: tests.LoginTest

testcase.name: verifyValidLogin
testcase.system-out: Application opened with baseUrl, which is: https://www.saucedemo.com/ Value filled in email textbox located by, By.id: user-name Value filled in password textbox located by, By.id: password Clicked on login button located by, By.id: login-button Text captured from locator, By.xpath: //span[@class='title'] Text verified successfully, which is equals to: Products
